text: lqd 'arsalna rusulana balhjj alwadhat, wa'anzalna maeahum alkitab balahkam walshraye, wa'anzalna almyzan; lyteaml alnaas baynahum baledl, wa'anzalna lahum alhdyd, fih quatan shdydt, wamanafie lilnaas mteddt, waliaelam allah elmana zahrana llkhlq min yansur dinih warusulih balghyb. 'iina allah qawiun la yuqhar, eaziz la yghalab
